prompts.name: Summarization
prompts.prompt: Summarize the following text in three words only: {text}

prompts.name: Creative Writing
prompts.prompt: Write a short story about a character who discovers a hidden portal in their backyard.

prompts.name: Coding Help
prompts.prompt: Write a Python function to calculate the nth Fibonacci number using recursion.

prompts.name: Email Drafting
prompts.prompt: Draft a professional email to inform a client about a delay in project delivery.

prompts.name: Translation
prompts.prompt: Translate the following sentence from English to French: {sentence}

prompts.name: List Generation
prompts.prompt: Generate a list of 10 unique and creative business ideas.

prompts.name: Brainstorming
prompts.prompt: Provide 5 strategies to improve team collaboration in a remote working environment.

prompts.name: Code Explanation
prompts.prompt: Explain the following Python code snippet: {code}

prompts.name: Motivational Quote
prompts.prompt: Generate a motivational quote for someone starting a new journey in life.
